topic.title: TorrentPeek - Distributed search engines using BitTorrent and SQLite
magnetico - Autonomous (self-hosted) BitTorrent DHT search engine suite
topic.body:
https://github.com/boramalper/magnetico 

I wonder if this search engine could be used to discover "hidden" zeronet sites. Guess, I have to try it out one day.
